about_the_game:
Originally included on the companion CD for the RPG Maker 2000 Handbook released in 2001, these images, audio, and video assets have been remastered for use with RPG Maker MZ! This collection includes an extensive variety of image assets, such as tilesets, characters, and animations, as well as a wide range of sound effects and voice samples. Additionally, there are versatile video assets perfect for enhancing your game’s visuals.

The handbook also includes original assets that can be used in RPG Maker 2000 and RPG Maker 2003!

If you’ve ever wanted to get your hands on the assets from the handbook but couldn’t due to its rarity, this is your chance. Don’t miss this must-have asset collection!

≪Contents≫

MZ/img (Image Assets for MZ)

  • [animations]
    9 types of animation assets

  • [battlebacks1]
    19 types of battle backgrounds

  • [characters]
    22 types of chibi character sprites for maps(16×16)

  • [enemies]
    23 types of enemy character assets

  • [faces]
    10 face graphics (no expression variations)

  • [parallaxes]
    30 parallax backgrounds (6 with looping support)

  • [pictures]
    47 types of pictures (16 bust-up images included)

  • [system]
    2 game over screen assets

  • [tilesets]
    20 map tile images(16×16)

  • [titles1]
    22 title screen images (9 with logos included)

MZ/audio (Audio Assets for MZ)

  • [me]
    18 types of ME assets

  • [se]
    1,209 sound effects (390 voice clips included)

MZ/movies (Video Assets for MZ)
29 video assets (available in both WebM and MP4 formats)

original/img (Image Assets for RPG Maker 2000)

  • [Battle]
    9 types of animation assets

  • [Backdrop]
    19 battle background assets

  • [Charset]
    22 chibi character sprites for maps

  • [Monster]
    23 enemy character assets

  • [Faceset]
    5 face graphics (no expression variations)

  • [Chipset]
    5 tileset assets (including autotiles)

  • [Panorama]
    30 parallax backgrounds (6 with looping support)

  • [Picture]
    47 types of pictures (16 bust-up images included)

  • [Gameover]
    2 game over screen assets

  • [System]
    6 system images

  • [Title]
    22 title screen images (9 with logos included)

original/sound (Audio Assets for RPG Maker 2000)

  • SE
    1,226 sound effects (390 voice clips included)

original/Movie (Video Assets for RPG Maker 2000)
29 video assets (in AVI format)

------------

・This pack is for use in RPG Maker Series or the engine of your choice.

・OK to be used in Commercial projects made in RPG Maker

・You may modify some of the assets (but not redistribute them) for your own game use only.
